summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to financing certain capital activities of Seattle Department of Transportation; authorizing the creation of a City fund; authorizing the loan of funds from the City's Consolidated (Residual) Cash Pool, or its participating funds, to the new fund; creating positions to implement Capital Improvement Program projects in the Bridging the Gap funding package; making appropriations; and amending the 2007-2012 Capital Improvement Program; all by a three- fourths vote of the City Council.
